    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        public MockItemScorer.Builder addUser(long user,
                             SparseVector usv)
        Add an user's entire score vector to the mock scorer.
        Parameters:
        user - The user.
        usv - The vector of scores to use. This will replace any previously-added scores.
        Returns:
        The builder (for chaining).

      • addScore

        public MockItemScorer.Builder addScore(long user,
                              long item,
                              double score)
        Add a score. When the item is scored for the user, the mock scorer will return this score.
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        item - The item ID.
        score - The score to return.
        Returns:
        The builder (for chaining).

      • build

        public MockItemScorer build()
        Construct the mock item scorer.
        Returns:
        A mock item scorer that will return the configured scores.
